resources.string: Hello! I am Zobaer, a software engineer based in Dhaka, Bangladesh.I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.I am doing my graduation from International University of Business Agriculture and Technology, I joined the engineering team at Pioneer Alpha where I work on a wide variety of interesting and meaningful projects on a daily basis.
